name: SRC sistemske integracije d.o.o.
goal:
Razvoj, implementacija in vzdrževanje IT sistemov za gospodarstvo in javni sektor
Digitalna transformacija gospodarskih družb in javne uprave
Svetovanje glede optimizacije poslovnih procesov
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Communication, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Environment, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
COMMISSION IMPLEMENTING REGULATION (EU) 2016/7
of 5 January 2016 establishing the standard form for the European Single Procurement Document
